resources.string: Interactive navigation with a multi-level map of the educational institution using GPS

\t\t\tNavigation allows creating a level-by-level route from your location to a specific room in the educational institution. \t\t\tSwitching between map levels is controlled by user actions, preventing arbitrary location recognitions and spontaneous floor switching on the map. \t\t\tThe app ensures seamless navigation between individual level maps of each building of the educational institution.

\t\t\tAfter optionally switching to the remote mode provided in the app, the available functionality is limited to viewing the schedule, additional information about planned classes, and viewing your account and other users\' accounts. \t\t\tLong-pressing an element in the schedule in remote learning mode will navigate to the lecture link instead of building a route to the pre-defined room.
Conscious limitation of app functionality to simplify navigation in remote learning mode

\t\t\tCreating a schedule within the app ensures an easy transition to building a route to the room where the class is scheduled. \t\t\tSaving and restoring the schedule allows easy transfer of the schedule between users by saving and reading data into a structured JSON file. \t\t\tThe schedule corresponding to the student\'s group can also be found and downloaded from the educational institution\'s website.
Creating and editing the student/teacher schedule
Exiting edit mode without saving changes will save the entered data to a backup database. You can restore them during the next schedule editing.
A backup schedule copy has been found. You can restore previously made schedule changes or start editing from scratch by deleting them.
Do you really want to delete this lecture from the schedule? Confirm or cancel this action:
Make sure you have granted location access permission
To continue working, grant the app permission to access location services
Location not recognized yet, please wait
Schedule saved in the documents folder
After creating or restoring, the student/teacher schedule will be displayed on this page
To simplify route building on the university\'s interactive map, it is recommended to create or restore the schedule from a .json file
All mandatory fields must be filled
Points to create the road are not selected
